publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3665 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Rule 9.6.3A—That the Parliament agrees under Rule 9.6.3A that the Parliament shall consider the general principles of the Joint Inspection of Children’s Services and Inspection of Social Work Services (Scotland) Bill on the third sitting day after the lead committee report is published. Supported by: George Lyon*
